meta.description: As the CBC Canada report on the grave incident of a Chinese spy caught pilfering secret virus research from a top Canadian lab some observers see possible link with the strange assassination of a top Canadian bio expert in Africa earlier this year. Earlier today we reported 'Chinese Spy Caught In Canadian BioLab Stealing Deadly

title: Assassination Link to China Spies in Canada BioLab? | Principia Scientific Intl.
cleaned_text:
As the CBC Canada report on the grave incident of a Chinese spy caught pilfering secret virus research from a top Canadian lab some observers see possible link with the strange assassination of a top Canadian bio expert in Africa earlier this year.

Earlier today we reported ‘Chinese Spy Caught In Canadian BioLab Stealing Deadly Viruses!’ and it begs the question: is there is a link to events below?

In February 2020 in a story titled, ‘Frank Plummer – Canadian Scientist Key To Coronavirus Investigation Assassinated In Africa?’ Greatgameindia.com reported that renowned scientist Frank Plummer, who received Saudi SARS Coronavirus sample and was working on Coronavirus (HIV) vaccine, died “in mysterious conditions” in Kenya.

“According to CBC, Plummer, 67, was in Kenya, where he was a keynote speaker at the annual meeting of the University of Nairobi’s collaborative centre for research and training in HIV/AIDS/STIs. Dr. Larry Gelmon, who helped set up that meeting, said Plummer collapsed and was taken to hospital in Nairobi, where he was pronounced dead on arrival. No confirmed cause of death has yet been released.”

What is not mentioned in the CBC report however is that Plummer worked in the same National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) in Winnipeg, Canada from where Chinese Biowarfare agent Xiangguo Qiu and her colleagues smuggled SARS Coronavirus to China’s Wuhan Institute of Virology where it is believed to have been weaponized and leaked.

Infact, as GreatGameIndia reported in our exclusive report on Coronavirus Bioweapon, as Scientific Director Frank Plummer was the one who acquired the SARS Coronavirus sample of the Saudi patient at the NML Winnipeg Lab from Ron Fouchier, a leading virologist at the Erasmus Medical Center (EMC) in Rotterdam, the Netherlands who was sent the virus by Egyptian virologist Dr. Ali Mohamed Zaki who isolated and identified a previously unknown type of Coronavirus from the Saudi patient’s lungs.

Fouchier sequenced the virus from a sample sent by Zaki using a broad-spectrum “pan-coronavirus” real-time polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) method to test for distinguishing features of a number of known coronaviruses known to infect humans.

In a bizarre coincidence (or maybe not!) www.redstate.com (June 15, 2020) now reports that an ‘NIH Investigation Reveals China Paid U.S. Biomedical Scientists Millions in Grants on the Down Low.’

In what is increasingly seen as fullscale biomedical espionage by China for some time, these events have culminated this month in the resignation or firing of over 50 scientists who had taken grant money for their work from China — and failed to disclose that funding.

A new report from Science Magazine indicates that 189 scientists at 87 institutions were initially targeted and the data, described by Michael Lauer, NIH’s head of extramural research, as “sobering,” is just that.

In the vast majority of cases, Lauer reported, the person being investigated has been an Asian man in his 50s. Some three-quarters of those under investigation had active NIH grants, and nearly half had at least two grants. The 285 active grants totaled $164 million. Lauer also presented data on the nature of the violations that NIH has uncovered. Some 70{154653b9ea5f83bbbf00f55de12e21cba2da5b4b158a426ee0e27ae0c1b44117} (133) of the researchers had failed to disclose to NIH the receipt of a foreign grant, and 54{154653b9ea5f83bbbf00f55de12e21cba2da5b4b158a426ee0e27ae0c1b44117} had failed to disclose participation in a foreign talent program. In contrast, Lauer said, only 9{154653b9ea5f83bbbf00f55de12e21cba2da5b4b158a426ee0e27ae0c1b44117} hid ties to a foreign company, and only 4{154653b9ea5f83bbbf00f55de12e21cba2da5b4b158a426ee0e27ae0c1b44117} had an undisclosed foreign patent. Some 5{154653b9ea5f83bbbf00f55de12e21cba2da5b4b158a426ee0e27ae0c1b44117} of cases involved a violation of NIH’s peer-review system.

We will keep readers updated as and when further reports are made public.

About the author: John O’Sullivan John is CEO and co-founder (with Dr Tim Ball) of Principia Scientific International (PSI). John is a seasoned science writer and legal analyst who assisted Dr Ball in defeating world leading climate expert, Michael ‘hockey stick’ Mann in the ‘science trial of the century‘. O’Sullivan is credited as the visionary who formed the original ‘Slayers’ group of scientists in 2010 who then collaborated in creating the world’s first full-volume debunk of the greenhouse gas theory plus their new follow-up book.

PRINCIPIA SCIENTIFIC INTERNATIONAL, legally registered in the UK as a company incorporated for charitable purposes. Head Office: 27 Old Gloucester Street, London WC1N 3AX.
